info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 7:34PM CDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Hamilton County through 800 PM CDT... At 734 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Norris City, or 9 miles north of Eldorado, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Hamilton County, including the following locations... Broughton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
